name: RetroFuture_Diorama
description:
This diorama box contains interactable UI, Camera control, mollifying background music, and vivid 3d models. It is designed to display 3d models created by different designers in Game Design Studio projects and offer a relaxing visual atmosphere.

Control method: 

LMB - control camera movement

Scroll Wheel - Zoom in/ out 

Statement

The retro-futurism scene designed and created for this assignment is completely related to assets created by myself and the other designer's assets uploaded in SharePoint library, permission forms are signed and confirmed by those designers already.

The major topic of this scene is a retro-futurism fuel station that exists on the earth and is run by robots. The background story happened in an age without human beings but full of robots. 

My inspiration is dedicated to expressing vivid robot life within the fuel station.

To reiterate, all the folders and objects were managed carefully and systematically by fully following the permission form, color palette, and general request on the assignment request form.

Acknowledge

I acknowledge the traditional owners and custodians of the lands we created and are holding this Grad Show on, the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin nation. I pay my respects to their elders past, present and emerging. Sovereignty was never ceded.
